entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight and ending before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
